Name: Patricia Marthone, New York City Health and Hospitals Corporation
Title: RESOLUTION DESIGNATING PATRICIA MARTHONE FOR APPOINTMENT BY THE MAYOR AS A DIRECTOR OF THE NEW YORK CITY HEALTH AND HOSPITALS CORPORATION.
BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

History.Description: This Resolution was Introduced by Council
This Resolution was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections
This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
History.BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

History.Description: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
History.BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

Text: RESOLVED, Pursuant to Section 4 of the New York City Health and Hospitals Act (Chapter 1016 of the Laws of 1969), the Council hereby approves the designation of Patricia Marthone, a resident of Brooklyn, for appointment by the Mayor to serve as a director of the New York City Health and Hospitals Corporation for the remainder of a five-year term that will expire on March 20, 2028.
